pkgmetadata.longdescription: This ENIGMA package is both the backend and engine to the LateralGM and RadialGM frontends. ENIGMA is a developer environment/toolchain is used to compile Game Maker games, GML (Game Maker Language) scripts, and EDL (Enigma Development Language) scripts that have syntax between GML and C++.
